word: I have received and read your letters. I thank you for your painstaking efforts to write to me. You write the very news that I wish to hear. I am pleased to hear from you, and to know of your successful meetings. The good report is like cold water to a thirsty soul.--Letter 104, 1910, p. 1. (To S. N. Haskell and wife, October 18, 1910.)
